materials-header.title: Chemical raw materials offer
materials-header.description: The competence and expertise of the Medicos team allow us to provide each client with high-quality, tailor-made chemical raw materials that are the foundation for innovation and efficiency in industrial products. We specialise in providing the optimum raw materials for each technological process, guaranteeing support at every stage - from design to final implementation.
materials-filter.search: Search for a raw material by name, INCI or CAS number...
materials-content.title: No materials matching the specified criteria
materials-content.description: We currently do not have raw materials that meet the given criteria. Clear the filters and see the full offer.
materials-dont-find.title: Haven't found the raw material you need?
materials-dont-find.description: If you could not find the product you are interested in, please contact us via the contact form.
material-modal.form: Use the contact form to ask about raw material
material-modal.name: Trade name
material-modal.more-info-description: More information is available in the technical specifications of the product and in the safety data sheet available at this address (e-mail):
